a: Visit the loans section and submit documents.

q: What documents are required for opening a new bank account?
a: You need a valid ID proof, address proof, passport-size photo, and PAN card to open a new bank account.

q: How can I block my debit card?
a: You can block your debit card immediately through mobile banking, internet banking, or by calling customer support.

q: How long does it take to get a credit card approved?
a: Credit card approval usually takes 2–5 working days after document verification.

q: Can I increase my credit card limit?
a: Yes, you can request a credit limit increase through mobile banking or by contacting customer support.
